org.fest.swing.fixture
Class JFileChooserFixture

java.lang.Object
  org.fest.swing.fixture.ComponentFixture<JFileChooser>
      org.fest.swing.fixture.JFileChooserFixture

public class JFileChooserFixture
extends ComponentFixture<JFileChooser>

Understands simulation of user events on a JFileChooser and verification of the state of such JFileChooser.

Author:
Yvonne Wang

Method Detail

selectFile

public final JFileChooserFixture selectFile(File file)
Selects the given file in the JFileChooser managed by this fixture.

Parameters:
file - the file to select.
Returns:
this fixture.
Throws:
AssertionError - if the managed JFileChooser can select directories only and the file to select is not a directory.
AssertionError - if the managed JFileChooser cannot select directories and the file to select is a directory.

setCurrentDirectory

public final JFileChooserFixture setCurrentDirectory(File dir)
Sets the current diretory of the JFileChooser managed by this fixture to the given one.

Parameters:
dir - the directory to set as current.
Returns:
this fixture.

fileNameTextBox

public final JTextComponentFixture fileNameTextBox()
Returns a fixture that manages the text field where the user can enter the name of the file to select in the JFileChooser managed by this fixture.

Returns:
the created fixture.
Throws:
ComponentLookupException - if a matching text field could not be found.

cancel

public final void cancel()
Simulates a user pressing the "Cancel" button in the JFileChooser managed by this fixture.

Throws:
ComponentLookupException - if the "Cancel" button cannot be found.
AssertionError - if the "Cancel" button is disabled.
